title: Tapestry Roundel
description:
At top, boy lying on his stomach playing flute; shrub in background; seated dog to right; center, seated child playing with dog; lower left, a woman with child; lower center, sheep and goats clustered about male figure with staff at right. 
Colors; as in preceding textiles, but better preserved, save in lower right corner where roundel is stained. 
 
Condition:  Some slits in tapestry; frayed at left and right sides.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view

For more information about the Museum's rights project, including how rights types are assigned, please see our blog posts on copyright. If you have any information regarding this work and rights to it, please contact copyright@brooklynmuseum.org.

completeness.name: Good
completeness.description: Most data is approved, but records have not been fully vetted. Many objects have quality photos and descriptions.
